title: Jam on Hawthorne
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. American breakfast, brunch and lunch served in a big, art-filled cafe that's family & vegan friendly. Has clearly labeled vegan and gluten free choices for breakfast and lunch items, many made-in-house items and condiments. Children's play area available.
